TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Assistant implements class Microsoft.Office.Core._IMsoDispObj

Docs.summary: Represents the Microsoft Office Assistant.

remarks.para: Use the Assistant property to return the Assistant object. There isn't a collection for the Assistant object; only one Assistant object can be active at a time. Use the property to display the Assistant, and use the property to enable the Assistant.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ActivateWizard (int WizardID, Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoWizardActType act, object Animation);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ActivateWizard([in]int32 WizardID, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoWizardActType act, [in]object Animation) runtime managed
Public Sub ActivateWizard (WizardID As Integer, act As MsoWizardActType, Optional Animation As Object)

Docs.param: The number returned by the method.
Specifies the change to the Office Assistant Help session.
The animation the Office Assistant performs when it is suspended or resumed.
Docs.summary: Resumes or suspends Office Assistant Help during a custom wizard.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoAnimationType Animation { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoAnimationType get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoAnimationType value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets an animation action for the Office Assistant.

remarks.para: When this property is applied to the object and the Assistant supports the specified animation, the Assistant is animated immediately (if the Assistant is visible and enabled).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Application { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns an Application object that represents the container application for the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AssistWithAlerts { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant balloon delivers application alerts when the Office Assistant is visible.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AssistWithHelp { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant appears when the user presses the F1 key to display Help.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AssistWithWizards { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant provides online Help with wizards.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BalloonError As MsoBalloonErrorType

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates the last recorded balloon error.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

MemberSignature.Value: public int DoAlert (string bstrAlertTitle, string bstrAlertText, Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAlertButtonType alb, Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAlertIconType alc, Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAlertDefaultType ald, Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAlertCancelType alq, bool varfSysAlert);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 DoAlert([in]string bstrAlertTitle, [in]string bstrAlertText, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAlertButtonType alb, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAlertIconType alc, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAlertDefaultType ald, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoAlertCancelType alq, [in]bool varfSysAlert) runtime managed

Public Function DoAlert (bstrAlertTitle As String, bstrAlertText As String, alb As MsoAlertButtonType, alc As MsoAlertIconType, ald As MsoAlertDefaultType, alq As MsoAlertCancelType, varfSysAlert As Boolean) As Integer

public: int DoAlert(System::String ^ bstrAlertTitle, System::String ^ bstrAlertText, Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoAlertButtonType alb, Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoAlertIconType alc, Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoAlertDefaultType ald, Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoAlertCancelType alq, bool varfSysAlert);

Docs.param: Sets the title of the alert.
Sets the text of the alert.
Determines which buttons are displayed on the alert.
Determines the icon that is displayed on the alert.
Determines which button is set as the default button of the alert. If this argument is set to a value greater than the number of buttons, an error is returned.
Always set this to msoAlertCancelDefault. Any other setting may return an error.
True if the alert is displayed in a message box or False if the alert is displayed through the Office Assistant.
Docs.summary: Displays an alert and returns an Integer that indicates which button the user pressed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void EndWizard (int WizardID, bool varfSuccess, object Animation);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndWizard([in]int32 WizardID, [in]bool varfSuccess, [in]object Animation) runtime managed
Public Sub EndWizard (WizardID As Integer, varfSuccess As Boolean, Optional Animation As Object)

Docs.param: The number returned by the StartWizard method.
True to indicate that the user completed the wizard successfully.
The animation the Office Assistant performs if is set to True. The default value is msoAnimationCharacterSuccessMajor.
Docs.summary: Releases the variable returned by the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool FeatureTips { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant provides information about using application features more effectively.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FileName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the path and file name for the active Office Assistant.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool GuessHelp { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant balloon presents a list of Help topics based on keywords the user selects before clicking the Assistant window or pressing F1.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Help() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Displays the Office Assistant and the built-in "What would you like to do?" Assistant balloon for standard Office online Help.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HighPriorityTips { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant displays high-priority tips.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item As String
public: property System::String ^ default { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the text associated with an object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeyboardShortcutTips { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant displays Help about keyboard shortcuts.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Left { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Sets or returns the horizontal position of the Office Assistant window (in points), or the distance (in pixels) of the command bar, from the left edge of the specified object relative to the screen.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MouseTips { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant provides suggestions for using the mouse effectively.

public: void Move(int xLeft, int yTop);

Docs.param: The left position of the Office Assistant window, in points.
The top position of the Office Assistant window, in points.
Docs.summary: Moves the Office Assistant to the specified location.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MoveWhenInTheWay { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant window automatically moves when it's in the way of the user's work area.

public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the name of the specified object.

Docs.summary: Creates an Office Assistant balloon.

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant is enabled.

public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the Parent object for the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Reduced { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant window appears in its smaller size.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResetTips() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Resets the application tips that appear in the Office Assistant balloon.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SearchWhenProgramming { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant displays application and programming Help.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Sounds { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant produces the sounds that correspond to animations.

MemberSignature.Value: public int StartWizard (bool On, string Callback, int PrivateX, object Animation, object CustomTeaser, object Top, object Left, object Bottom, object Right);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 StartWizard([in]bool On, [in]string Callback, [in]int32 PrivateX, [in]object Animation, [in]object CustomTeaser, [in]object Top, [in]object Left, [in]object Bottom, [in]object Right) runtime managed

Public Function StartWizard (On As Boolean, Callback As String, PrivateX As Integer, Optional Animation As Object, Optional CustomTeaser As Object, Optional Top As Object, Optional Left As Object, Optional Bottom As Object, Optional Right As Object) As Integer

Docs.param: True to display the Office decision balloon. The Office decision balloon asks the user whether he or she wants help with the active custom wizard. It isn't necessary to use the property to display the Office Assistant if you specify True for this argument.

The name of the callback procedure run by the Office decision balloon and the branch balloon. The branch balloon allows the user to choose between custom Help you've provided for the wizard and standard Office Help.
A number that identifies the balloon that initiated the callback procedure.
The animation the Office Assistant performs when this method is used. The default value is msoAnimationGetWizardy.
False to display the Office decision balloon.
The position of the corners (in points and relative to the screen) of the custom wizard form the Office Assistant will avoid when the Office Assistant appears.
The position of the corners (in points and relative to the screen) of the custom wizard form the Office Assistant will avoid when the Office Assistant appears.
The position of the corners (in points and relative to the screen) of the custom wizard form the Office Assistant will avoid when the Office Assistant appears.
The position of the corners (in points and relative to the screen) of the custom wizard form the Office Assistant will avoid when the Office Assistant appears.
Docs.summary: Starts the Office Assistant and returns an Integer value that identifies the session.

remarks.para: You should use this method only to run the Office Assistant in a custom wizard.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TipOfDay { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the Office Assistant displays a special tip each time the Office application is opened.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Top { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Sets or returns the distance (in points) from the top of the Office Assistant, or from the top edge of the specified command bar, to the top edge of the screen.

remarks.para: For docked command bars, this property returns or sets the distance from the command bar to the top of the docking area.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Visible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: True if the specified object is visible.
